title: ocean week icon and mystery champion

replies.body: do you get the mystery champion at a random time after ocean week?

They're still rolling out the mystery champs. They do them in batches basically. They'll put a post up on the boards like they did for the icon when the rollout is done, if you haven't got it by then, send in a ticket :)
Sometime when the next patch is released.

What i want to know is will we get some kind of warning as to WHAT champion we get when we get it. I have at least 13 champs i dont have atm and i can't remember all of them so it would be a pain to have to sift through and see which my new one is!!

Also i hope i dont get garg or kennen. There is a reason i didn't buy them, they suck.
uhh, it comes up next time you log in, after they gift it, just like it would be if a friend or someone gifted you.
i still havent got min too..
